content: Phase 1.4: Add Fizze Admin tab with full CRUD interface

Phase 1.6: Test Phase 1 changes with curl and screenshots
Phase 2.1: Create roles.py with permission system

Phase 3.1: Call integration playbooks for Facebook, Instagram, TikTok

Phase 4.3: Install analytics and optimize performance
Phase 4.4: Test SEO with Lighthouse audit
Phase 5.1: Call comprehensive testing agent

Phase 5.3: Fix medium and low-priority bugs, achieve 100% pass rate
Phase 6.1: Create production documentation (README, RUNBOOK, checklist)

Phase 6.3: Final screenshots and launch verification
